document_data.name: Moon Shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moon shield''''' was a multi-[[school of magic|school]] [[divine]] spell that conjured a incorporeal [[shield]] of shimmering lunar energy.
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, the ''moon shield'' materialized near the caster and floated beside them. It appeared to be made of pure moonlight and provided illumination as such.

The moon shield partially protected the caster from [[death magic]], spells that fell under the [[sun sphere]], and effects that emanated from the [[undead]].
document_data.History: This spell was contained within the [[ring]]s that composed ''[[the Moonweb]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required the [[material component]]s of a small piece of [[silver]] and a [[moonstone]] of nearly any size.
